project.name: J-C369A-LUCE-08-ST03-DT03-DF05-CF19-01
project.description: This test takes in a value passed in as an argument and uses it to compute a divisor which is later used in a modulus operation.

iopair.name: J-C369A-LUCE-08-ST03-DT03-DF05-CF19-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: index a single file Environment variable defining test value.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="245" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND GOOD-02 AND GOOD-03 AND GOOD-04 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

output_checks.simple_check: if [[ -a ../testData/good-01-index/_0.cfe ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
